purpose: Loads a single image URL from the image store for a given image ID and size, returning the resolved URL along with loading and error state
Batch-loads multiple image URLs from the image store for a list of image IDs and returns a Map of resolved URLs with a combined loading flag
Fetches and caches lightweight metadata (dimensions, entity info) for a set of image IDs from the image store, returning a Map of metadata by ID
Re-exports the image store hook that loads a single image URL for a given ID and size, returning the URL with loading and error state
Re-exports the image store hook that batch-loads multiple image URLs, returning a Map of resolved URLs and a combined loading flag
Re-exports the image store hook that fetches and caches metadata for a set of image IDs, returning a Map of metadata keyed by image ID
Ensures narrative events for a specific entity are loaded from the backend and returns the array of that entity's narrative events
Returns the current overall status object of the narrative store, including loading and error state
Returns a boolean indicating whether the narrative store is currently loading data
Returns a boolean indicating whether narrative events for a specific entity are currently being fetched
Returns a boolean indicating whether narrative events for a specific entity have already been loaded and are ready to use
Returns all narrative events currently held in the store as a flat array
Returns a boolean indicating whether the full collection of narrative events is currently being loaded
Returns a boolean indicating whether the full collection of narrative events has finished loading
Renders a parchment or vellum background texture by loading a photo through a canvas processing pipeline and displaying it as a soft-light blended repeating tile
Renders a collapsible debug panel that exposes live controls for tuning parchment texture configuration parameters
Renders decorative scroll-corner ornaments in all four corners of a page to create a framed layout effect
Renders an SVG ornamental filigree divider with gold scrollwork and frost-blue accent tendrils for use between content sections
Renders a decorative SVG ice-crystal band with irregular frost spikes and a gradient background, positioned at the top or bottom edge of a content area
Tracks window width via a resize observer and returns the current responsive breakpoint as one of mobile, tablet, or desktop
Renders a searchable multi-select dropdown that lets users pick tags from a registry, add new tags, and optionally switch between match-any and match-all modes
Renders a row of badges showing how many times each external tool (e.g. nameforge, coherence) was used, with optional compact icon-only mode
Renders badges listing which generators, systems, or other items reference a given configuration element, and optionally shows a 'Not used' badge when unreferenced
Renders a labeled dropdown that lets the user select a single value from a list of options, with optional search filtering
Renders a chip-based multi-select control where selected values appear as removable chips and new values are chosen from a filtered dropdown
Renders a searchable trigger-activated dropdown that lets the user pick one item from a filterable list of named items
Renders a visual level selector combining a labeled discrete scale with an optional numeric slider input for choosing a value from a predefined set of named levels
Renders a controlled numeric text input that buffers local edits and commits a validated, optionally integer-clamped number to the parent on blur or Enter
Renders a textarea that maintains a local draft of text and commits the value to the parent only when the user finishes editing, preventing excessive re-renders
Renders a small icon-only button with optional danger styling and a tooltip title
Renders a styled container box with an optional title header and arbitrary child content for displaying informational callouts
Renders a section heading row with an optional icon, title, item count, description, and right-aligned action controls
Renders a centered empty-state placeholder with an optional icon, title, description, and call-to-action children for use when a list or panel has no content
Renders a collapsible category group with a header showing an icon, label, item count, and bulk-enable toggle, with a configurable grid of rendered items below
Renders a clickable card-shaped button used to initiate adding a new item to a list
Renders a styled button for adding a new item to a list, visually distinct as an inline action rather than a card
Renders a full-screen modal overlay with a sidebar containing an icon, title, optional tabs with badge support, and a footer, trapping keyboard focus and closing on overlay click unless disabled
Renders a labeled row with a name, optional child controls, and an optional remove button for use in editable list items
Renders an inline editor for mapping pressure IDs to numeric delta values, letting users add, adjust, and remove pressure change entries
Renders a card with a clickable header that toggles an expanded content region, passing an optional stable ID back to the toggle callback to support efficient list renders
Renders a labeled form field wrapper with an optional hint text below and support for full-width layout
Renders a horizontal flex row wrapper that arranges multiple FormGroup controls side by side
Renders a badge displaying an error count, hiding itself when the count is zero
Renders a badge indicating that an item is orphaned (not assigned to any era), hiding itself when the item is not orphaned
Renders a compact error-count badge intended for display inside tab labels to surface validation issue counts
Renders a row of era name badges for an item, capping the visible count and showing an overflow indicator when there are more eras than the maximum
Renders a detailed read-only view of a chronicle seed's role assignments, temporal context, and generation parameters for inspection in validation or debug UIs
Renders a modal dialog wrapping the ChronicleSeedViewer to display a chronicle seed's generation context in an overlay
Renders a collapsible inline section that shows or hides a ChronicleSeedViewer for inspecting a chronicle seed's generation context
Manages a locally buffered copy of an external string value and syncs it back to the parent via a debounced or event-driven callback, preventing controlled input jitter
Manages the selection, creation, deletion, and reordering state for a list editor, persisting the selected item ID to storage and providing stable callbacks for all list mutations
Renders a clickable card-shaped button for adding a new item, serving as the canonical source component that is re-exported from the shared-components index
Renders an interactive matrix grid showing coverage relationships between rows and columns with search, grouping, and cell click handling
Renders a compact toggle switch for enabling or disabling a boolean setting with optional label
